Comment: This should be cut-in, wall-to-wall breaking news on every broadcast in the country.   The US is a constitutional democracy. Our government is based on a constitution, which is held as the supreme law of the land. The constitution and laws passed using the process outlined in the constitution limit the powers of the government.   Our highest-officed representative has spent months (including the last few days) talking about how he doesn’t think he has to abide by the supreme law of the land. That our government’s powers with him at the helm are not subject to the limits put on them by the people.  It’s a big fucking deal, but apparently the media is going to continue freedom-washing fascism in realtime, because they know most the people in this country are so fucking dumb that they won’t care.
